type: Tutorial Step - What About Free Riders?

definition.text: Free riders are a problem, but we choose to assume goodwill! We trust that once you start helping the project, other people will be inspired and follow!

paragraphs.text: The project will soon implement an incentives scheme to further promote the desired behavior and to foster the culture of collaboration.
This means that our first choice to deal with free-riding is the positive route!
Enough preamble! Let's get on with it!
